document.full_text: the securities and exchange commission (sec) sought information from bank of america corp  last year about the loan-loss reserves used to repurchase faulty home loans, company filings showed.
document.title: sec sought information from bofa on loan-loss reserves: filing
lines_and_colors: the securities and exchange commission (sec) sought information from bank of america corp  last year about the loan-loss reserves used to repurchase faulty home loans, company filings showed.
